```js
svg.append('rect')
    .attr({
        x: '10px',
        y: '10px',
        width: 80,
        height: 80,
        fill: 'red'
    })
    .transition()
    .duration(5000)
    .attr({ fill: 'blue' });
```

```js
svg.append('rect')
    .attr({
        x: 10,
        y: 10,
        width: 80,
        height: 80,
        fill: 'red'
    })
    .transition()
    .duration(5000)
    .attr({
        x: 460,
        y: 150,
        width: 40,
        height: 40,
        fill: 'blue'
    });
```

```js
.transition()
.delay(1000)
.duration(4000)
```

```js
svg.append('rect')
    .attr({
        x: 10,
        'y': 10,
        width: 80,
        height: 80,
        fill: 'red'
    })
    .transition()
    .delay(1000)
    .duration(2000)
    .attr({
        x: 240,
        y: 80,
        width: 60,
        height: 60,
        fill: 'purple'
    })
    .transition()
    .duration(2000)
    .attr({
        width: 40,
        height: 40,
        x: 460,
        y: 10,
        fill: 'blue'
    });
```
